review: I really like this little thing.  It was a lot smaller than I thought it would be, the remote too.  It's very easy to use, very responsive and has an awesome array of options.  I like it because I can watch youtube on my TV.  One thing; you really, really, really, really, really need Amazon Prime with this.  They just work so well together.  I'm not much of a gamer so I can't really comment there.  Everything else, though, is top notch.
